org.fun.game.tetris

Class Tetrion

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.fun.game.tetris.Tetrion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Closeable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Tetrion
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Closeable
    The Tetrion is the frame that surrounds the playfield and the "machine" that plays Tetris.

    This class is based on Jan Bodnar's Tetris game clone in Java Swing.

    Author:
    Jan Bodnar, Mathieu Brunot
    See Also:
    Tetrion, Playfield, Tetris Guideline, Tetris game clone in Java Swing, Serialized Form
